attributes.action: Petition in favour of relocation of agricultural hay barn at Frankby Farm
attributes.background: Full planning permission has been granted by wirral borough council for an agricultural hay barn to be built at Frankby Farm Wirral. Originally it was to be built near Hillbark Road  due to constant acts of vandalism at the farm we now wish for it to  be relocated near to the stables for safety

rejection.details:
The decision to grant planning permission is the responsibility of your local council and not the UK Government. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Or you could contact Wirral Metropolitan Borough Council directly to ask for advice about how to raise this request:

https://www.wirral.gov.uk/about-council/contact-us/how-contact-council
